text: you can use Dates to parse these into DateTime objects, floor to the seconds, and then use `unique` to get the first occurence of each duplicate

text:
This can be done with `combine`

1. Make a variable `second`, which groups ticks in the same second
2. Sort by tick time
3. do `combine`: `combine(first,  groupby(df, :second))`
